title: Newer & Modern 3 Bed. 1.5 Bath Southwest Philly Home! W/D! Yard! C/A!!
description:
Newer & Modern 3 Bed., 1.5 Bath Home w/Washer and Dryer, Driveway, Yard & more! Walk in and find a large living room with beautifully restored hardwood floors; nice-sized dining room with hardwood floors; beautiful eat-in kitchen with newer hardwood floors and newer upper and lower wood cabinets, granite countertops and stainless steel appliances including refrigerator, gas range, dishwasher, and garbage disposal. Recreation room in basement with laundry room - newer washer and dryer, powder room, storage room and access to the large rear yard with side yard too! 2nd floor features 3 nice-sized bedrooms with plenty of closet space, hardwood floors, and lots of natural light. There is also a 3-piece ceramic tile bathroom. Come see this! Front driveway! Central Air! Baseboard/radiator gas heat! Tenant pays all utilities -gas, electric, cable/internet, lawn care, and cold water/sewer. Cats and small dogs below 25 lbs. ok with a non-refundable pet fee! First, last and security required at lease signing. 1 year lease minimum. Potential tenants can apply online at www.forresterpropertymgmt.com - $75 non refundable application fee with two paystubs/some income verification and photo ID. We run a credit, criminal and eviction check. For gross monthly income, we look for 3x the rent. If approved, you will be charged a document preparation fee of $100.00. THIS FEE IS NON-REFUNDABLE. Each resident over the age of 18 must submit a separate rental application.. Contact Mike Giordano at  show contact info
!

title: Nice 1BR in Manayunk with Central Air and Laundry
description:
Very nice one-bedroom apartment coming available November 1. Open concept living/dining room and kitchen with original hardwood floors.  The kitchen has a center island and all appliances including dishwasher.  Kitchen and bathroom were recently updated. The bedroom is carpeted and includes a large closet and a ceiling fan. The apartment has its own central HVAC system and its own washer/dryer.
The rent for the apartment is $1350 plus utilities. If you are interested, send some basic information about yourself, who would be living in the apartment and when you are looking to move. Also let us know your availability to check it out. FYI, no pets and no smoking in the apartment.

title: Cute 3-story home in Fairmount, 2 beds 1 bath
description:
Welcome to 891 N Taney Street, a newly renovated 3-story home within the lovely Fairmount neighborhood. On each floor of this home you’ll find tons of natural sunlight, original hardwood floors, and plenty of charm. On the 1st floor, you’ll find a spacious living room and updated kitchen with dishwasher, and an outside patio for cookouts. On the 2nd floor is a cozy bedroom and updated full bathroom with storage space. On the 3rd floor you enter a beautiful sun-lit studio which could be used as a second bedroom or work-from-home office space. Central heating and washer and dryer are in the basement.
The neighborhood is super friendly and quiet within walking distance to the Fairmount Park, the Art Museum, Aldi and Whole Foods, and one block away from Lucky Goat Coffee House, and a couple more to Musette Coffee. Conveniently close to both business corridors on Fairmount Ave and Girard Ave. Take a jog or your bike down the Schuylkill River Trail, or take one of the many bus lines, (like the number 7, 15, 32, 48, or 49) that service the area for easy access to the rest of the city.
Lease begins December 1st, 2022. 1 year lease or 6 month lease available.
Tenant pays first month’s, last month’s rent, and security deposit at signing.
Tenant responsible for $30/month for water and sewage, electricity, gas, internet, and renters insurance.
Pets welcome for one-time fee of $250 per pet.
Tenant will pay $29 application fee using Zillow's background screening, link will be emailed to you if interested.
Currently wrapping up renovations to the whole house. Lease begins December 1st. Home tours begin after renovations finish, starting November 15th.
Email or call to schedule a viewing.

title: Why Rent When You Can Buy!!!
description:
NOT ENOUGH $$$ TO BUY A HOME?
You’d be surprised how little you really need!
Owning A Home is so much more valuable than paying for rent making the Landlord's Pockets larger while making yours smaller.
If you have limited cash but the desire, we can help! Learn how you can stop paying rent and finally own a home of your own you can purchase your new home with the first month's rent, the last month's rent, and a month's security. Also, you can use your income tax return in 2023 and buy your first home. Why rent when you can own? it's really that simple, call me or email me and I will explain the process of getting a mortgage compared to signing a lease. It's that Easy
If you are considering buying a home now or in the near future I'm here to help as your local Realtor, just send me an email or call the 888 ext 1460 number and I'll be glad to walk you through the steps of becoming a homeowner with 10 easy steps!
Elisamuel Cruz

title: 2BR Sweet Apt across from Clark Park
description:
Beautiful and spacious 2 BR apt. in 4500 block of Kingsessing Ave. Stunning views of Clark Park. Only a few blocks to Trolley Lines, Coffee Shops, and a variety of Restaurants. Available March 1. $1390/month + utilities
This apartment is bright and very comfortable, located on the 3rd floor of a beautiful Victorian house.  Includes central AC.
The building is located in a nice, largely residential neighborhood. It is just minutes away from the St. Joe's/USP Campus and 15 minutes from Penn. There is a trolley stop nearby, which can take you to Center City.
$1390/mo.
Building features:
Close proximity to St. Joe's/USP (just 2 blocks away) and Penn (15 mins away) - located within Spruce Hill
Next to Clark Park which features a weekly farmer's market and various events throughout the years
Trolley stop at nearby corner - Routes 11, 13, 34 and 36.
Laundry facilities in building basement
Landlord pays only water. Tenants pay electricity, gas and internet.
STANDARD DEPOSIT OF FIRST MONTH, LAST MONTH, AND SECURITY DEPOSIT REQUIRED FOR MOVE-IN.

South Philly: Walk to Passyunk Ave food scene, Target, Starbucks and Sprouts a few blocks away at Broad and Washington.

Private half bath in the primary bedroom.

Renter's insurance required.
S. Philly / S. Philadelphia / Passyunk Square.

title: Great living for the winter months
description:
Please read details closely before requesting more information.
This is a two-story house. The first floor apartment size space is available for rent.
This location is suitable for people 35 and older. Non smokers and non meat eaters are welcome.
This is a Great space with plenty of room:
The First floor accommodations are: 2 large bedrooms which include 3 beds (two queen beds & one sofa bed). The living room has a small fireplace & TV with movies, news, etc. available on demand.
There are 1 1/2 bathrooms in this first floor furnished space along with beautiful views of this historic property and landscape from all directions. The house is located at the edge of Pittsfield. (at the Dalton, MA sign).
It is 3 blocks to Walmart, market 32, and restaurants.
The rent is $1850 per room/mo. $1850 security fee. (utilities are included).
This property is managed by a responsible, down-to-earth landlord. Applicants are required to complete a rental application and authorize a $55 credit and background check.
Call Accem at  show contact info
There is presently no washer/dryer but for a small charge on Sunday's there is a pickup and delivery service.
Internet included along with a Spacious shared kitchen with dining area,
Large Living Room with fireplace and
Indoor Hot Tub (in separate room).
All utilities included
Dogs under 20lbs are welcome if well trained and groomed.
This space is available for rent for a 3-4 month contract starting on November 1st 2022.

title: Lovely Single-Family 5BR/2BA Near-Morgan hall/Liacouras centre/Campus
description:
Welcome to 1624 N Bouvier St! This lovely single-family home is perfect for large groups who want to stay close to campus and prioritize space and privacy. Enjoy having direct access to Temples main campus along with other popular student areas like Fresh Grocer, Morgan Hall and The Liacouras Centre. This house has five bedrooms, with a sixth bonus room that could also be used as a bedroom or second living room. The first floor includes access to the unfinished basement, kitchen, living room, washer and dryer, and backyard.
Morgan Hall
Rear Patio
Fresh Grocer
Close to Campus

title: BEAUTIFUL 3 bedroom 1.5 bathroom house on a NICE
description: Beautiful 3 bedroom 1.5 bathroom house on a nice, quiet, tree-lined block in the heart of Fishtown! This home features a great light-filled kitchen with modern appliances (including central air and laundry), good sized living spaces and private outdoor areas both in front and out back to entertain and spend time cultivating your patch of earth, plus a side corridor for easier trash days (don't underestimate this part!). The first floor takes you through the living room from the front door, straight into the dining room lined with exposed brick, and then to the kitchen with beautiful backsplash, stainless steel appliances and tons of space for your culinary imagination.PLEASE CONTRACT PAUL MALONEY(717) 323-24-26

title: Fishtown Townhouse 2 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath
description:
2344 1/2 E Tucker St is a 2-bedroom, 1.5-bath located in the trendy Fishtown neighborhood has central air, in-unit laundry, recessed lighting, stainless steel appliances, plenty of natural light, closet space, ceiling fans, granite countertops, a built-in microwave, a gas stove, and a backyard that if fully fenced in for privacy and great for entertaining.
Public transportation is plentiful and I-95 is easily accessible. Tucker Street features plenty of parking and is safely located across the street from St. Anne's Church.
Water is included. All application fees are non-refundable. Pets require a one-time, non-refundable deposit of $150 and $25/month. Requires first month, last month, and 1-month for a refundable security deposit at move-in. Rental requirements include a good credit and rental history, a successful background check, and references. The minimum gross income is 3x the cost of rent.

YES, WE ARE OPEN! CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR! OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!If you’re looking for a modern and hip space to call home, then look no further than Apex Manayunk. Located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, we feature modern 1, 2, and 3-bedroom loft style apartments and townhomes, many with dens. Our 2 and 3-bedroom townhomes have a fun and industrial feel. That’s because Apex Manayunk expertly blends three brand-new buildings with four historic textile mill structures to create one of the region’s most exciting luxury apartment communities. title: charming one bedroom on tree covered street
description:
Lovely one bedroom apartment in the heart of historic powelton village: good light through out the apartment, kitchen with plenty of storage, old iron bathtub, three closets, original hardwood floors, bay window in bedroom, old solid doors and little original fixtures throughout the apartment and the building.
There is a beautiful wooden porch where you can sit to look at the tree covered street. Friendly and creative neighbors, two old stone churches on the block, close to plenty of restaurants and a short walk to 34th st. subway. There is also a backyard and storage for bikes. Looking for someone to move in by December 1st

title: Cozy & Cute 2 Bedroom Apt. Perfect fit for just about any-body.
description: Cozy & Cute 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Apt. This well built brick front ranch was designed with quality in mind and the current owner has only made it better., the main level is sunny and comfortable with a kitchen with all of the storage space you will ever need. The cabinets and pantry both have slide out shelving. The dining a area has a picture window. The living room, also with a large picture window has a cathedral ceiling and a heat pump. The front entry connects everything, and is very spacious making an excellent reception area. The primary bedroom with heat pump, and double closet has a full bath with jetted tub surrounded nicely with white subway tile . Finishing up the main level there is a laundry room with a heat pump, and has a direct exit to the backyard patio. The second part of this home is on the lower level. It is connected to the main level with an interior staircase featuring a chair lift, or you can enter from the side lawn through a main entry door. You will enter into the spacious open kitchen, living room studio floor plan. There is a second room that has been used for the bed or you could have a den or office.

title: Walk in closets! Great views!
description:
YES, WE ARE OPEN! CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR! OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!If you’re looking for a modern and hip space to call home, then look no further than Apex Manayunk. Located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, we feature modern 1, 2, and 3-bedroom loft style apartments and townhomes, many with dens. Our 2 and 3-bedroom townhomes have a fun and industrial feel. That’s because Apex Manayunk expertly blends three brand-new buildings with four historic textile mill structures to create one of the region’s most exciting luxury apartment communities. Amenities Include:Bocce ball fieldUpgraded Gourmet Kitchens with Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Countertops and Breakfast Bar SeatingMarble master baths, some with deep linen storage48-hour Maintenance CommitmentAlexa or Google Home Capable in all ApartmentsUpgraded Hardwood Floors in all Foyers, Kitchens, Dining and Living RoomsGame Room with Billiards Table, Shuffle Board, and more9' ceilings with large windowed walls featuring unobstructed views of the river, canal or courtyardBBQ and deck areaUpgraded One, Two and Three Bedroom Loft Style Apartment Homes and Townhomes, many with densJogging trail right outside your doorOnline Payments AvailableCall:  show contact info
